channel.title: dave@scripting.com
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: Almost a third of people with 'mild' Covid-19 still battle symptoms months later, study finds.

item.description: In the early 2000s we had an API for writing tools to plug into content systems. We need this more than we did then. Writing tools must be able to develop independently of how the writing is distributed. Simple idea, any developer can understand the need.

source:outline.text: In the early 2000s we had an API for writing tools to plug into content systems. We need this more than we did then. Writing tools must be able to develop independently of how the writing is distributed. Simple idea, any developer can understand the need.

item.description: Dan Conover, longtime friend and former reporter, writes some of the best political analysis I read, for free. Unfortunately it's on Facebook. I wish Dan would post on a blog. but it is what it is. 😁

item.description: The arrival of The Shot has transformed the grim pop-up clinics of the pandemic into gratitude factories — reassembly lines where Americans could begin to put back together their busted psyches.
